creator: tekenaar: Trinquesse, Louis Rolland
title: Portret van de kunstenaar Charles Michel-Ange Challe, in profiel naar links
subject: Challe, Charles Michel-Ange

description: A bowl. In the centre a motive is drawn encircled by a band of short lotus panels. On the lip-rim a frieze of peaches with leaves is drawn. The outside wall is decorated with alternating twice: a lion dog (fu) and a scroll of peonies. Around the footring a band of half-circles is drawn.
creator: : anoniem
title: Kom uit V.O.C.-schip de 'Witte Leeuw'

description: A bowl. In the centre a simple flower is drawn encircled by a band. On the lip-rim a band is also drawn. On the outside a continuous scroll of stylized flowers is drawn very sketchily.
creator: : anoniem
title: Kom uit V.O.C.-schip de 'Witte Leeuw'
